hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #2# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #5# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Compass Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Slingshot#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Hidden Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #stable#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that invisible ghosts can be exposed with Deku Nuts.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path of #Skulls#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #Skulls#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Potion Bottle# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #House of Twins#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path of #Skulls#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Falling Ceiling Room Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Deku Stick#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: Have you seen my dodongo? Very large, eats everything, responds to "King".^Call Darunia in Goron City if found. Huge rupee reward!

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.

SFM (Saria).text: Hi! I'm currently on an exchange program from Termina.^They say that East Clock Town is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Bug Bottle# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Saria's House#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.
